actions.description: Multi-Attack: 2×Claw Claw [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8) and Restrained if it's this Being's second Claw to hit it this Turn Shapeshift [Cast, Self (Focus)]: Takes on the appearance of a Medium Humanlike.

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Amphibious: It can breathe air and water.
Fade Out: When it Moves, it turns itself and anything it is carrying Invisible for the duration (Focus). If it has a Being Restrained, it turns them Invisible for the duration as well.
Magic Ward II: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d6 penalty.
Terror I: Enemies that can see it for the first time and at the start of their Turns must pass [Will] or be Frightened (Cd4).
Bestiary Bestiary 154 154 Hag, Grove TL: 9.7 Medium Fae (Shapechanger) Nightmarish brutes of crones that reside in swamps and dead woods. They are known for devouring humans with their iron claws and teeth.
HD: 8 (36 HP)  Speed: 50' (Cling) Zone: Frontline Morale: 10  # Appearing: 1 Senses: Allsight, Darksight Armor: 4 [as (+1) Plate] Weak: Cold Iron Weapons ACTIONS Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite. A Being hit by all three is Restrained and takes 18 (4d8) damage at the start of this Being's Turns.
Bite [Melee Attack]: 7 (d8+3) Claw [Melee Attack]: 7 (d8+3) Shapeshift [Cast, Self] (Focus): Takes on the appearance of a Medium Humanlike.
ABILITIES Blair Omniscience: It is always aware of any Beings within the woodland it claims as its domain.
Magic Ward I: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d4 penalty.
Terror I: Enemies that can see it for the first time and at the start of their Turns must pass a [Will] Save or be Frightened until they pass this Check on a subsequent Turn, or for Cd4 Rounds afterwards.
